verbs.description: baconize (third-person singular simple present baconizes, present participle baconizing, simple past and past participle baconized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, cooking) To prepare like bacon, by smoking etc.
examples: Can you not choose a process more pleasant to the world at large, if you must thus “baconize” your bodies?

entries.meaning: (transitive, cooking) To prepare with bacon as an ingredient.
examples: Baconized Macaroni and Corn, with its crisp bacon, suggests a delight  […]
